plot: Jun is a teenage girl who is going through a secret abortion. Mei, Jun's eight-year-old sister, as an observer, explores Jun's pain in her own way and through her own world.
title: Gua zi
plot_es: Jun is a teenage girl who is going through a secret abortion. Mei, Jun's eight-year-old sister, as an observer, explores Jun's pain in her own way and through her own world.
plot_en: Jun is a teenage girl who is going through a secret abortion. Mei, Jun's eight-year-old sister, as an observer, explores Jun's pain in her own way and through her own world.
